name: PolyForm
description: A Google Forms alike tool for creating forms and reviewing results. Designed with simplicity in mind.
Besides a sleek-looking front end, I also created an extensive API server featuring data safety and limitation checks.

images.alt: Screenshot of the PolyForm project's website

name: Webflow Library
description: A simple gallery for user-created  Webflow components. Features extensive filtering options, easy access management and a stylized design.

images.alt: Screenshot of the Webflow Library project's website

name: Derry city guide
description: Virtual guide for the City of Derry created as part of an Erasmus project in Northern Ireland. It gained a very positive reviewer and local community acclaim.

images.alt: Screenshot of the Derry Guide project's website
